text: he nabee! jab tum log taî€¼laaq do apanee patniyon ko, to unhen talaaq do unakee iddat ke lie, aur ganana karo iddat kee tatha daro apane paalanahaar allaah se aur na nikaalo unhen unake gharon se aur na vah svayan nikalen, parantu ye ki ve koee khulee buraee kar jaayen tatha ye allaah kee seemaayen hain aur jo ullanghan karega allaah kee seemaon ka, to usane atyaachaar kar laya apane oopar. tum nahin jaanate sambhavatah allaah koee naee baat utpann kar de isake pashchaat
